sentences.sContent: ...in line with past experience capital expenditure in the oil sector has dropped sharply in many producing countries...

...Her best hope in Germany was a government job-prospects for women in the private sector were dim...

...Government agencies and the private sector often use IDPs to_...
...A recurring criticism of the UK's university sector is its perceived weakness in translating new knowledge into new products and services...
...How can the university sector play a key role in the UK's economic growth...
...we do have to challenge the unthinking complaint that the sector does not do enough in taking ideas to market...
